alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 1:19AM MST until January 16 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches at lower elevations, and 4 to 6 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From Noon today to 10 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slippery and hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
